Scripts.OnClick: MobMapDotFrame_OnClick(self);
MobMapDotFrame_OnClick();
MobMap_ShowMobMapFrame();

if(self:GetParent().questid~=nil) then if(MobMap_ParseQuestID(self:GetParent().questid)==true) then return; end end if(self:GetParent().questobj~=nil) then MobMap_ParseQuestObjective(self:GetParent().questobj); end if(self:GetParent().questtitle~=nil) then MobMap_ParseQuestTitle(self:GetParent().questtitle, self:GetParent().questobjectivetext); end if(self:GetParent().unknowntext~=nil) then MobMap_ParseQuestTitleOrObjective(self:GetParent().unknowntext); end if(self:GetParent().reagentname~=nil) then MobMap_ParseQuestObjective(self:GetParent().reagentname, MOBMAP_PARSETYPE_ITEMNAME); end
self:GetParent():Hide();
self:GetParent():Hide();
MobMap_ShowExportFrame();
MobMap_ShowPanel("MobMapMobSearchFrame");
MobMap_ShowPanel("MobMapQuestListFrame");
MobMap_ShowPanel("MobMapMerchantListFrame");
MobMap_ShowPanel("MobMapRecipeListFrame");
MobMap_ShowPanel("MobMapDropListFrame");
MobMap_ShowPanel("MobMapPickupListFrame");
MobMap_ShowPanel("MobMapQuestEventFrame");
MobMap_ShowPanel("MobMapAboutFrame");
MobMap_UpdateMemoryUsage(self);
self:GetParent():Hide();
MobMap_DeletePositionData(); MobMap_ExportData();
MobMap_DisplayColorSelector(mobmap_outer_dot_color);
MobMap_DisplayColorSelector(mobmap_inner_dot_color);
MobMap_QuestTracker_ResetTrackerPos();
MobMap_DisplayColorSelector(mobmap_questtracker_status.backcolor);
